panels.title: Aries Event Logger: Connection Invitations and Credential Offers
Number of Pending or Failed Connection Invitations
Number of Pending or Failed Credential Offers

panels.description: Average Number of Connections that are being activated per second
panels.title: Connection Activation Rate (per Second)

panels.description: Average Number of Credentials issued per second
panels.title: Credential Issuance Rate (per Second)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=INVITATION"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=ACTIVE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=connectionRecord"
      |= "state=RESPONSE"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (connectionId)
)

panels.title: Connection Protocol Transition Times  (per Minute in Milliseconds)

targets.expr:
avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=OFFER_SENT"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=REQUEST_RECEIVED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

avg (
  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ACKED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId) -

  max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=credentialRecord"
      |= "state=CREDENTIAL_ISSUED"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (credentialExchangeId)
)

panels.description: Proof requests are send and expected to be invalid as the credentials have been revoked previously

targets.expr:
count_over_time({app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=presentationRecord"
  |= "state=REQUEST_SENT"
  |= "Expected to be valid"
[10d]) -
  
count_over_time({app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=presentationRecord"
  |= "state=VERIFIED"
  |= "Expected to be valid"
[10d])

panels.title: Credential Revocation Checks - Proof Request Protocol Transition Times  (per minute in Milliseconds)

panels.description: Allows to see if any RevReg/Index combination has been assigned to multiple credentials. In case it is > 2 a RevReg/Index combination has been assigned to two different credentials.
panels.title: Verify RevReg/Index Combinations are Unique

targets.expr:
avg (
max_over_time (
    {app="aries-load-generator"}
      |= "type=publish_credential_revocations_stopped"
      | logfmt 
      | unwrap time
  [1m]) by (trackingId) -

max_over_time (
  {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=publish_credential_revocations_started"
    | logfmt 
    | unwrap time
[1m]) by (trackingId)
)

panels.title: Average Duration to publish "Credential Revocations" (per Minute in Milliseconds)

panels.description: Indicates if multiple "Publish Revocation" processes are started parallel

targets.expr:
count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/connections/create-invitation httpCode:400"
  |= "Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/issue-credential/send httpCode:400"
  |= "Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
  |= "The current accumulator value"
  |= "must be equal to the last accumulator value"
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
  |= "Error retrieving revocation registry. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
  |= "Revocation registry metadata not found."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already."
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:422"
    |= "is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key"
[10d])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/connections/create-invitation httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:422"
    |= "is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
  |= "type=aries_client_error"
  |= "request:POST/issue-credential/send httpCode:400"
  |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
    |= "The current accumulator value"
    |= "must be equal to the last accumulator value"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "request:POST/connections/receive-invitation httpCode:400"
    |= "Error when updating storage record value. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint"
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
    |= "Error retrieving revocation registry. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection."
[1m])

count_over_time(
 {app="aries-load-generator"}
    |= "type=aries_client_error"
    |= "POST/revocation/revoke httpCode:400"
    |= "Revocation registry metadata not found."
[1m])

options.content:
- *1: Error when adding OR fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection.
- *2: Internal Server Error
- *3: recipientKeys [...] is not a raw Ed25519VerificationKey2018 key
- *4: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection.
- *5: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: database is locked.
- *6: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint
- *7: Error when updating storage record value. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: no such savepoint
- *8: Error when adding storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already.
- *9: Error when fetching storage record. Backend error. Caused by: error returned from database: sorry, too many clients already.
- *10: The current accumulator value [...] must be equal to the last accumulator value
- *11: Error retrieving revocation registry. Backend error. Caused by: pool timed out while waiting for an open connection.
- *12: Revocation registry metadata not found. 
- *13: Revocation registry not found.
- *14: Nginx Gateway Time-out

panels.title: Total Number of Errors Reported through Events

 {app="aries-load-generator"}

[10d])

panels.title: Number of Errors Caught by Test Runner
Docker Container Metrics: Issuer/Verifier Wallet DB
Host Metrics (only for Linux and only if "node_exporter" is running)

targets.legendFormat: ListenOverflows - Times the listen queue of a socket overflowed
ListenDrops - SYNs to LISTEN sockets ignored
TCPSynRetrans - SYN-SYN/ACK retransmits to break down retransmissions in SYN, fast/timeout retransmits
RetransSegs - Segments retransmitted - that is, the number of TCP segments transmitted containing one or more previously transmitted octets
InErrs - Segments received in error (e.g., bad TCP checksums)
OutRsts - Segments sent with RST flag
CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT
MaxConn - Limit on the total number of TCP connections the entity can support (Dinamic is "-1")
